UADataType.Description: Contains the values used to indicate how a percentual value is displayed if the stacklight unit works in Levelmeter mode.

Field.Name: Other
Field.Description: Display fractions in a way not defined in this version of the specification.

uax:Description.uax:Text: Display fractions in a way not defined in this version of the specification.

UADataType.Description: Holds the possible colour values for stacklight lamps.

Field.Name: Red
Field.Description: This value indicates a red lamp colour.

Field.Name: Green
Field.Description: This value indicates a green lamp colour.

Field.Name: Blue
Field.Description: This value indicates a blue lamp colour.

Field.Name: Yellow
Field.Description: This value indicates a yellow lamp colour (R+G).

Field.Name: Purple
Field.Description: This value indicates a purple lamp colour (R+B).

Field.Name: Cyan
Field.Description: This value indicates a cyan lamp colour (G+B).

Field.Name: White
Field.Description: This value indicates a white lamp colour (R+G+B).

uax:Description.uax:Text: This value indicates a red lamp colour.
This value indicates a green lamp colour.
This value indicates a blue lamp colour.
This value indicates a yellow lamp colour (R+G).
This value indicates a purple lamp colour (R+B).
This value indicates a cyan lamp colour (G+B).
This value indicates a white lamp colour (R+G+B).

UADataType.Description: Contains the values used to indicate in what way a lamp behaves when switched on.

Field.Name: Continuous
Field.Description: This value indicates a continuous light.

Field.Name: Blinking
Field.Description: This value indicates a blinking light (blinking in regular intervals with equally long on and off times).

Field.Name: Flashing
Field.Description: This value indicates a flashing light (blinking in intervals with longer off times than on times, per interval multiple on times are possible).

Field.Name: Other
Field.Description: The light is handled in a way not defined in this version of the specification.

uax:Description.uax:Text: This value indicates a continuous light.
This value indicates a blinking light (blinking in regular intervals with equally long on and off times).
This value indicates a flashing light (blinking in intervals with longer off times than on times, per interval multiple on times are possible).
The light is handled in a way not defined in this version of the specification.

UADataType.Description: Contains the values used to indicate how a stacklight (as a whole unit) is used.

Field.Name: Segmented
Field.Description: Stacklight is used as stack of individual lights

Field.Name: Levelmeter
Field.Description: Stacklight is used as level meter

Field.Name: Running_Light
Field.Description: The whole stack acts as a running light

Field.Name: Other
Field.Description: Stacklight is used in a way not defined in this version of the specification

uax:Description.uax:Text: Stacklight is used as stack of individual lights
Stacklight is used as level meter
The whole stack acts as a running light
Stacklight is used in a way not defined in this version of the specification

UAVariable.Description: Collects the data type descriptions of http://opcfoundation.org/UA/IA
Collects the data type descriptions of http://opcfoundation.org/UA/IA

UAReferenceType.Description: References of this type link Variables managing statistical data either directly or indirectly to an Object or ObjectType implementing the IStatisticsType interface.

UAVariable.Description: Contains the audio data, e.g. for devices capable of audio playback.
Enumerate the acoustic signals. Instances of StackElementAcousticType index into this number using the OperationMode Property.

UAObjectType.Description: Base interface for managing statistical data.

UAMethod.Description: Restarts all statistical data, including a reset of the StartTime to the current time.

UAVariable.Description: Indicates the point in time at which the collection of the statistical data has been started.

UAObjectType.Description: Base interface for managing statistical data that is not rolled over all data from the start of tracking the statistical data are considered, until the tracking gets reset.

UAVariable.Description: The reason and context for the reset of the statistics, which is done without a trigger from an OPC UA Client, like calling the ResetStatistics Method. ResetCondition is a vendor-specific, human readable string. ResetCondition is non-localized and might contain an expression that can be parsed by certain clients. Examples are: “AFTER 4 HOURS”, “AFTER 1000 ITEMS”, “OPERATOR”. “OPERATOR” means, that an operator resets the statistics on a local HMI.

UAObjectType.Description: Base interface for managing statistical data that is rolled over, i.e. only a certain amount of data is considered for statistical data.

UAVariable.Description: The duration after the statistical data are rolled over. Only the data that were gathered during that duration are considered for the statistical data, even if the time intervals between the StartTime and the current time is longer.
The number of values before the data gets rolled over. For the statistical data, only the data fitting into the number of values is considered, even if more data were gathered since StartTime.

UAObjectType.Description: Used for control channels of single colour elements within a stack element (e.g. RGB elements would use three ControlChannels, one for each controllable colour).

UAVariable.Description: Indicates in what mode (continuously on, blinking, flashing) the channel operates when switched on.

Shows the channel’s intensity, thus its brightness. The mandatory EURange Property of the Variable indicates the lowest and highest value and thereby allows to calculate the percentage represented by the value. The lowest value is interpreted as 0 percent, the highest is interpreted as 100 percent.
Contains a list of audio signals used by this acoustic stacklight element.

Description.Locale: enIndicates if the colour is switched on.Indicates if the colour is switched on.

UAVariable.Description: Indicates if the colour is switched on.

UAObjectType.Description: Entry point to a stacklight containing elements of the stacklight as well as additional information valid for the whole unit.

UAObject.Description: Represent the stack elements (lamps and acoustic elements) the stacklight is composed of. The HasOrderedComponent Reference shall represent the ordering from the base of the stacklight.

UAVariable.Description: Enumerate the stacklight elements counting upwards beginning from the base of the stacklight.

UAObject.Description: Valid if the stacklight is used in “Levelmeter” StacklightMode. If so, the whole stack is controlled by a single percentual value. In this case, the SignalOn parameter of any stack element of StackElementLightType has no meaning.

UAVariable.Description: Indicates in what way the percentual value is displayed with the stacklight.

Shows the percentual value the stacklight is representing. The mandatory EURange Property of the Variable indicates the lowest and highest value and thereby allows to calculate the percentage represented by the value. The lowest value is interpreted as 0 percent, the highest is interpreted as 100 percent.
Shows in what way (stack of individual lights, level meter, running light) the stacklight unit is used.

UAObject.Description: Valid if the stacklight is used in “Running_Light” StacklightMode.

UAObjectType.Description: Entry point to a stacklight with the possibility to show the stacklight’s health status.

UAVariable.Description: Contains the health status information of the stacklight.

UAObject.Description: Contains alarms of the stacklights providing more detailed information on the health of the stacklight.

UAObjectType.Description: Base class for elements in a stacklight.

UAVariable.Description: Indicates, if the element is contained in the mounting base of the stacklight. All elements contained in the mounting base shall be at the beginning of the list of stack elements.
Enumerate the stacklight elements counting upwards beginning from the base of the stacklight.
Indicates if the signal emitted by the stack element is currently switched on or not.

UAObjectType.Description: Represents an acoustic element in a stacklight.

UAObject.Description: Contains a list of audio signals used by this acoustic stacklight element.

UAVariable.Description: Enumerate the acoustic signals. Instances of StackElementAcousticType index into this number using the OperationMode Property.

Indicates the sound pressure level of the acoustic signal when switched on. This value shall only have positive values. The mandatory EURange Property of the Variable indicates the lowest and highest value and thereby allows to calculate the percentage represented by the value. The lowest value is interpreted as 0 percent, the highest is interpreted as 100 percent.

Indicates what signal of the list of AcousticSignalType nodes is played when the acoustic element is switched on. It shall contain an index into the NumberInList of the respective AcousticSignalType Object of AcousticSignals.

UAObjectType.Description: Represents a lamp element in a stacklight.

UAObject.Description: The list of <ControlChannel> instances shows the control information for each independent colour channel of the stacked element.

UAVariable.Description: Indicates in what mode (continuously on, blinking, flashing) the channel operates when switched on.
Contains a list of audio signals used by this acoustic stacklight element.

Description.Locale: enIndicates if the colour is switched on.Indicates if the colour is switched on.

UAVariable.Description: Indicates if the colour is switched on.

Intensity of the lamp, thus its brightness. The mandatory EURange Property of the Variable indicates the lowest and highest value and thereby allows to calculate the percentage represented by the value. The lowest value is interpreted as 0 percent, the highest is interpreted as 100 percent.
Indicates the colour the lamp element has when switched on.
Shows in what way the lamp is used (continuous light, flashing, blinking) when switched on.

UAObjectType.Description: Contains information relevant to a stacklight operating as a level meter. The whole stack is controlled by a percentual value.

UAVariable.Description: Indicates in what way the percentual value is displayed with the stacklight.

Shows the percentual value the stacklight is representing. The mandatory EURange Property of the Variable indicates the lowest and highest value and thereby allows to calculate the percentage represented by the value. The lowest value is interpreted as 0 percent, the highest is interpreted as 100 percent.

UAObjectType.Description: Contains information relevant to a stacklight operating as a running light. This base type does not define any specific information, but can be extended.
